Verses: 1 appozhudhu Thaanmudhal Peyersebaamattumulla Isravel Puththirar Anaivarum Keeleyaa Dhesaththaarudan Mispaavile Karththarukku Munbaaga Egobiththu Sabaiyaagak Koodinaargal.
2 sagala Janangalin Adhipadhigalum, Isravelin Sagala Koththiraththaarum Dhevanudaiya Janamaagiya Sabaiyaagak Koodinindraargal; Avargal Pattayam Uruvugira Naalu Latcham Kaalaatkal,
3 isravel Puththirar Mispaavukku Vandha Seydhiyai Benyameen Puththirar Kelvippattaargal; Andha Akkiramam Nadandhadhu Eppadi, Sollungal Endru Isravel Puththirar Kettaargal.
4 appozhudhu Kolaiseyyappatta Sthreeyin Purushanaagiya Leviyan Maaruththaramaaga: Naanum En Marumanaiyaattiyum Benyameen Naattilulla Kibiyaavile Raaththanga Vandhom.

5 appozhudhu Kibiyaapattanaththaar Enakku Virodhamaai Ezhumbi, Ennaik Kolaiseyya Ninaiththu, Naan Irundha Veettai Raaththiriyile Valaindhu Kondu, En Marumanaiyaattiyai Avamaanappaduththinaargal; Adhinaale Aval Seththupponaal.

6 aagaiyaal Isravelile Avargal Ippadippatta Muraikettaiyum Madhikettaiyum Seydhapadiyinaal, Naan En Marumanaiyaattiyaip Pidiththuth Thundiththu, Isravelin Sudhandharamaana Sagala Naadugalukkum Anuppinen.
7 neengal Ellaarum Isravel Puththiraraame, Inge Aalosiththuth Theermaanam Pannungal Endraan.
8 appozhudhu Ellaa Janangalum Egamaai Ezhumbi: Nammil Oruvarum Than Koodaaraththirkup Pogavumpadaadhu, Oruvanum Than Veettirkuth Thirumbavumpadaadhu.
9 ippozhudhu Kibiyaavukku Seyya Vendiyadhu Ennavendraal: Seettuppottu Adharku Virodhamaagap Povom.

10 benyameen Koththiramaana Kibiyaapattanaththaar Isravelile Seydha Ellaa Madhikettukkum Thakkadhaaga Janangal Vandhu Seyyumpadikku, Naam Dhaaniyadhavasangalai Sambaadhikkiradharku, Isravel Koththirangalilellaam Nooruperil Paththupperaiyum, Aayiramperil Nooruperaiyum, Padhinaayiramperil Aayiramperaiyum, Therindheduppom Endraargal.
11 isravelarellaarum Ondrupola Egobiththup Pattanaththirku Munbaagak Koottankoodi,
12 ange Irundha Isravelin Koththiraththaar Benyameen Koththiramengum Aatkalai Anuppi: Ungalukkulle Nadandha Indha Akkiramam Enna?

13 ippozhudhu Kibiyaavil Irukkira Peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Andha Manusharai Naangal Kondru, Pollaappai Isravelai Vittu Vilakkumpadikku, Avargalai Oppukkodungal Endru Sollachchonnaargal; Benyameen Puththirar Isravel Puththiraraagiya Thangal Sagodhararin Sollaik Ketka Manamillaamal,
14 isravel Puththirarodu Yuththam Pannap Purappadumpadikku, Pattanangalilirundhu Kibiyaavukku Vandhu Koodinaargal.

15 kibiyaavin Kudigalile Therindhu Kollappatta Ezhunooruperaiyallaamal Annaalil Pattanangalilirundhu Vandhu Koodina Pattayam Uruvugira Manusharin Lakkam Irubaththaaraayiramper Endru Thogaiyidappattadhu.
16 andha Janangalellaarukkullum Therindhukollappatta Idadhukai Vaakkaana Ezhunooruper Irundhaargal; Avargal Anaivarum Oru Mayirizhaiyum Thappaadhapadikkuk Kavangal Erivaargal.
17 benyameen Koththiraththaiyallaamal Isravelile Pattayam Uruvugira Manushar Naalu Latchamper Endru Thogaiyidappattadhu; Ivargalellaarum Yuththaveeraraayirundhaargal.

18 isravel Puththiraraana Avargal Ezhumbi, Dhevanudaiya Veettirkup Poi: Engalil Yaar Mundhip Poi Benyameen Puththirarodu Yuththampanna Vendum Endru Dhevanidaththil Visaariththaargal; Adharkuk Karththar: Yoodhaa Mundhip Pogavendum Endraar.
19 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Kaalame Ezhundhu Purappattu, Kibiyaavukku Edhiraagap Paalayamiranginaargal.
20 pinbu Isravel Manushar Benyameenodu Yuththampannap Purappattu, Kibiyaavile Avargalukku Edhiraagap Por Seyya Anivaguththu Nindraargal.
21 aanaalum Benyameen Puththirar Kibiyaavilirundhu Purappattu, Isravelil Irubaththeeraayiramperai Andraiyadhinam Tharaiyile Vizhumpadi Sangariththaargal.
22 isravel Janangal Thangalaith Thidappaduththikkondu, Mudhalnaalil Anivaguththu Nindra Sthalaththile, Marupadiyum Porseyya Anivaguththu Nindraargal.

23 avargal Poi, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Saayankaalamattum Azhudhu: Engal Sagodhararaagiya Benyameen Puththirarode Thirumbavum Yuththam Kalakkappovomaa Endru Karththaridaththil Visaariththaargal; Appozhudhu Karththar: Avargalukku Virodhamaaip Pongal Endraar.
24 marunaalile Isravel Puththirar Benyameen Puththirar Kitta Serugirapodhu,

25 benyameen Koththiraththaarum Annaalile Kibiyaavilirundhu Avargalukku Edhiraagap Purappattuvandhu, Pinnum Isravel Puththiraril Pattayam Uruvugira Padhinennaayiramperaith Tharaiyile Vizhumpadi Sangariththaargal.

26 appozhudhu Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sagala Janangalum Purappattu, Dhevanudaiya Veettirkuppoi, Ange Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Azhudhu, Thariththirundhu, Andru Saayankaalamattum Ubavaasiththu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaiyum Samaadhaanapaligalaiyum Ittu,
27 karththaridaththil Visaariththaargal; Dhevanudaiya Udanpadikkaiyin Petti Annaatkalil Ange Irundhadhu.

28 aaronin Kumaaranaagiya Eleyaasaarin Magan Pinegaas Annaatkalil Avarudaiya Sannidhiyil Nindraan; Engal Sagodhararaagiya Benyameen Puththirarode Pinnum Yuththampannap Purappadalaamaa Purappadalaagaadhaa Endru Avargal Visaariththaargal; Appozhudhu Karththar: Pongal; Naalaikku Avargalai Ungal Kaiyil Oppukkoduppen Endraar.
29 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirar Kibiyaavai Sutrilum Padhividaiyaatkalai Vaiththu,
30 moondraamnaalile Benyameen Puththirarukku Virodhamaaip Poi, Mun Irandudharam Seydhadhupola, Kibiyaavukku Sameebamaaip Porukku Anivaguththu Nindraargal.

31 appozhudhu Benyameen Puththirar Janaththirku Virodhamaaip Purappattup Pattanaththai Vittu, Appaale Vandhu, Veliyile Beththelukkum Kibiyaavukkum Pogira Irandu Vazhigalil Isravel Janaththil Erakkuraiya Muppadhu Perai, Mudhal Irandudharam Seydhadhu Pola, Vettavum Kollavum Thodanginaargal.

32 munpola Namakku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappadugiraargal Endru Benyameen Puththirar Sonnaargal; Isravel Puththiraro: Avargalaip Pattanaththai Vittu Appaaleyirukkira Vazhigalile Varappannumpadikku, Naam Odavendum Endru Solliyirundhaargal.

33 appozhudhu Isravel Manushar Ellaarum Thangal Sthaanaththilirundhu Ezhumbi, Paagaaldhaamaarile Yuththaththirku Anivaguththu Nindraargal; Isravelaril Kibiyaavin Pallaththaakkile Padhivirundhavargal Thangal Sthaanaththilirundhu Purappattu,

34 avargalil Ellaa Isravelilum Therindhukollappatta Padhinaayiramper Kibiyaavukku Edhire Vandhaargal; Yuththam Balaththadhu; Aanaalum Thangalukku Vikkinam Nerittadhu Endru Avargal Ariyaadhirundhaargal.
35 karththar Isravelukku Munbaaga Benyameenai Muriya Adiththaar; Annaalile Isravel Puththirar Benyameenile Pattayam Uruvugira Aatkalaagiya Irubaththaiyaayiraththu Nooruperai Sangariththaargal.

36 isravelar Kibiyaavukku Appaale Vaiththa Padhividaiyai Nambiyirundhapadiyinaale, Benyameenarukku Idam Koduththaargal; Adhinaale Avargal Muriya Adikkappadugiraargal Endru Benyameen Puththirarukkuk Kaanappattadhu.
37 appozhudhu Padhividaiyirundhavargal Theeviramaaik Kibiyaavinmel Paaindhu Paravi, Pattanaththil Irukkiravargalellaaraiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vettinaargal.
38 pattanaththilirundhu Magaa Periya Pugaiyai Ezhumbappannuvadhe Isravelarukkum Padhividaikkaararukkum Kurikkappatta Adaiyaalamaayirundhadhu.

39 aagaiyaal Isravelar Yuththaththile Pinvaanginapodhu, Benyameenar: Mundhina Yuththaththil Nadandhadhupola, Avargal Namakku Munbaaga Muriya Adikkappadugiraargale Endru Solli, Isravelaril Erakkuraiya Muppadhuperai Vettavum Kollavum Thodanginaargal.
40 pattanaththilirundhu Pugaiyaanadhu Sthambampola Uyara Ezhumbinapodhu, Benyameenar Pinnaagap Paarththaargal; Idho, Pattanaththin Akkinijuvaalai Vaanapariyandham Ezhumbitru.
41 appozhudhu Isravelar Thirumbik Kondaargal; Benyameen Manusharo, Thangalukku Vikkinam Nerittadhaik Kandu Thigaiththu,

42 isravel Puththiraraivittu, Vanaandharaththirkup Pogira Vazhikku Neraaith Thirumbi Odipponaargal; Aanaalum Yuththam Avargalaith Thodarndhadhu; Pattanangalil Irundhavargalum Thangal Naduve Adappattavargalaik Kondrupottaargal.
43 ippadiye Benyameenarai Valaindhu Kondu Thuraththi, Kibiyaavukkuk Kizhakkuppuramaaga Varumattum, Avargalai Lesaai Midhiththuppottaargal.
44 idhinaal Benyameenarile Padhinennaayiramper Vizhundhaargal; Avargalellaarum Balavaangalaayirundhaargal.

45 matravargal Vilagi, Vanaandharaththil Irukkira Rimmon Kanmalaikku Odipponaargal; Avargalil Innum Aiyaayiramperai Vazhigalile Kondru, Matravargalaik Keedhommattum Pin Thodarndhu, Avargalil Irandaayiram Perai Vettippottaargal.
46 ivvidhamaai Benyameenaril Annaalil Vizhundhavargalellaarum Irubaththaiyaayiram Per; Avargalellaarum Pattayam Uruvugira Balavaangalaayirundhaargal.
47 arunooruper Thirumbikkondu Odi, Vanaandharaththilirukkira Rimmon Kanmalaikkup Poi, Rimmon Kanmalaiyile Naalu Maadham Irundhaargal.

48 isravelaro Benyameen Puththirar Mel Thirumbi, Pattanaththil Manushar Thodangi Mirugangalmattum Kandavaigal Ellaavatraiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti, Kanda Pattanangalaiyellaam Akkiniyaal Koluththip Pottaargal.
